subject: Re: Just incase
author: Adriana Jones
full_text:
oh so you did cancel your account....

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
> I know no one wiol hear it, and I'll get some "this is waht it really says",
> but......Don't know what it means exactly, but I've gotten that for months,
> and somoehtign about the 17th for yesars. but waht do I know?
> 
>  FYI, dumped Facebook, first it's a huge waste of time, and second, more of
> these self proclaimed experts, psychics, and mediums telling me what this
> stuff really is, that my stuff doesn't anything, and...one guy that can't
> even be 40 telling me he got his first EVP in 1976--what when he was
> freaking two years old!? I'm about done, can't even explain this shit
> without the one I'm trying to explain it to getting all pissy, like how dare
> I state how the boxes work. So, when I don't answer your e-mail, that's why.
> 
> 
> Frank-S
>
